questSteps.stepDescription: Items needed: Combat equipment
Talk to Moia outside of Senntisten, north of the Archaeology Guild (Chat ✓)
Enter Senntisten (Chat 1)
Kill 12 TzekHaar Monsters
Enter the Cathedral door to the south
Talk to Moia (Chat ~•3)
Head out of the Cathedral to the east and continue east to the Bik Front
Remove each fungus from the skilling node; Croesus will use mechanics from the boss fight in the following order in Additional Details
additionalStepInformation: 1.) Yellow Smoke
2.) Stun
3.) Green Smoke
4.) Blue Smoke
5.) Slime
6.) Red Smoke
You may want to bring either super restore potions or the runes for Crystal Mask.
If your stats get too low, Gorvek will save you by teleporting you back to the cathedral but your fungal removal process will be saved.
Deplete all resource in any order
Fishing
Woodcutting
Mining
Hunter

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to the Cathedral and talk to Saradomin.
additionalStepInformation: Can't teleport back, but you can lobby and re-enter Senntisten for faster transportation.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head out of the Cathedral to the south and talk to Azzanadra
Light the braziers following the combinations below, after lighting, enter the portal and kill the Generating glacors. You can ignore the glacytes.
additionalStepInformation: Food is advised as whilst lighting the braziers the Arch-Glacor will use similar mechanics from the boss fight.
Light only the east brazier, then enter portal to kill the glacor.
Extinguish the east brazier and light only the middle brazier, then enter portal to kill the glacor.
Extinguish the middle brazier and light only the west brazier, then enter portal to kill the glacor.
Lastly, light both the west and middle braziers, then enter portal and kill the glacor.

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to the Cathedral and talk to Saradomin.
additionalStepInformation: You can lobby for faster transportation back to Saradomin.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head out of the Cathedral to the west and command the abandoned siege engine
Click attack on each of the siege engines to destroy them, and for the two at the back, click on the floor nearby
Repeat this a few times until you enter another dialogue with Kerapac
After the dialogue, kill the remaining siege engines
Return to the Cathedral and talk to Seren
Talk to Moia (Chat 4)
additionalStepInformation: If you have not completed Fate of the Gods or if The Measure is lost, upon finishing dialogue with Vicendithas, visit Mr Mordaut east of the Anachronia lodestone to reclaim it.
Alternatively, teleport to the World Gate and travel to the Elder Halls where it can be picked up from the north of where you teleport in.

questSteps.stepDescription: Teleport to the Anachronia lodestone, and head north to the Effigy Incubator D&D
Enter the door under the Dragonkin statue (Chat 1)
Do the following in Additional Information once inside the Effigy Incubator area.
additionalStepInformation: Talk to Vicendithas.
Talk to Vicendithas again to give him the Measure.
Talk to Hannibus.
Talk to Vicendithas.
Talk to Hannibus again.
Talk to Vicendithas again.
Wait a moment and talk to Vicendithas again.
Activate the communication device and talk to Moia. (Chat 2)
Talk to Vicendithas. (Chat 2)

questSteps.stepDescription: Go to the World Gate and talk to Moia or one of the other NPCs. (Chat 4)
additionalStepInformation: Closest teleport is Sixth-Age Circuit

questSteps.stepDescription: Enter the World Gate to Tarddiad and talk to Hannibus or one of the other NPCs.
Investigate the three resonating crystals
additionalStepInformation: First crystal: to the south-east, next to Vicendithas.
Second crystal: just north-east of the first, next to Adrasteia and Moia.
Third crystal: in the Stone Gazebo, west of the previous crystal.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Vicendithas or one of the other NPC's to the north over the bridge.
Talk to Moia or one of the other NPC's and then enter the World Gate to Naragun and do the following in Additional Information
additionalStepInformation: Talk to Hannibus or one of the other NPC's just inside the World Gate.
Continue up the path and talk to Adrasteia or Hannibus.
Continue along the path and talk to Vicendithas or Moia.
Continue to the end of the path and talk to Adrasteia or one of the other NPC's.
Return to the World Gate. You can lobby.
Talk to Moia or one of the other NPC's.

questSteps.stepDescription: Enter the World Gate to Kethsi and continue the dialogue with Kerapac. (Chat ~•~•~)
Enter the World Gate again to Freneskae and do the following in Additional Information.
additionalStepInformation: Talk to Adrasteia (or one of the other NPCs). (Chat 1)
Descend ledge to the north. (Chat 1)
Talk to Hannibus (or one of the other NPCs).
Exit rock face to the west. (Chat 1)

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Adrasteia or one of the other NPC's (Chat 1)
Descend the ledge to the north (Chat 1)
Talk to Hannibus or one of the other NPC's
Exit the rock face to the west (Chat 1)
Approach the dark portal
Descend the ledge to the north again (Chat 1)
Talk to Hannibus (or one of the other NPCs)
Exit the rock face again (Chat 1)
Talk to Moia or one of the other NPC's (Chat 4) and a cutscene will play
Approach the dark portal
When inside Erebus your time and movement speed will be limited. Do the following in Additional Information to gain more time and increased movement speed
additionalStepInformation: You can initially explore Erebus for 1 minute before you are pulled out of the area.
When you are pulled out of the area you will keep the level of Erebus Rift Attunement and any item that you gained, but some aspects of the environment reset to their initial state.
As your attunement grows, you will gain the following benefits as listed
1.) At 20% attunement your movement speed is increased slightly.
2.) At 40% attunement you can stay in Erebus for an additional 15 seconds at a time (a minute and 15 seconds without the handicap).
3.) At 60% attunement you can run in a normal way.
4.) At 80% attunement you can stay in Erebus for an additional 30 seconds at a time (a minute and 30 seconds without the handicap).
5.) After twenty attempts (entering and leaving) your available time can increase by one second for each time that you enter Erebus. Talk to Kerapac to toggle this.

questSteps.stepDescription: First Visit should follow in Additional Information.
additionalStepInformation: When you are ready to start, approach dark portal. (Chat 1)
Mine the two shadow animica rocks and crush the resulting shadow animica for a total of 8% attunement. 8% total attunement
Capture the two motes of shadow anima for 8% attunement. 16% total attunement
Enter the rift in the east.
Capture the skittish mote of shadow anima for 4% attunement. 20% total attunement
Capture the telekinetic soul remnant.
Return back to the initial area.
Levitate the boulder using the enduring soul remnant.
Move the boulder out of the way to open the way north.
Mine the shadow animica rock and crush the resulting shadow animica for 4% attunement. 24% total attunement
Capture the abyssal soul remnant.
Use the abyssal soul remnant to enter the rift in the south.
Capture the regular and skittish motes of shadow anima for 8% attunement. 32% total attunement
Leave via the extra action button or wait for the time to expire

questSteps.stepDescription: Second Visit Should follow the steps in Additional Information. Re-enter Erebus and re-obtain the abyssal soul remnant. The following must be done without exiting, so you may wish to re-enter again after obtaining the remnant to guarantee you have enough time. Do this here on out.
additionalStepInformation: Capture the telekinetic soul remnant.
Use the abyssal soul remnant to enter the rift in the west.
Capture the regular and skittish motes of shadow anima for 8% attunement. 40% total attunement
Levitate the boulder using the enduring soul remnant.
Move the boulder out of the way to open the way east.
Mine the shadow animica rock and crush the resulting shadow animica for 4% attunement. 44% total attunement
Capture the two regular and one skittish mote of shadow anima for 12% attunement. 56% total attunement
Leave via the extra action button or wait for the time to expire

questSteps.stepDescription: Third Visit to Erubus as you should follow in Additional Information.
additionalStepInformation: Use the abyssal soul remnant to enter the rift in the west.
Levitate the boulder using the enduring soul remnant.
Move the boulder on one of the three circles on the timeworn lodestone in the east.
Return to the initial area and capture another telekinetic soul remnant.
Return to the area with the three circles and levitate the boulder (which has an abyssal soul remnant underneath) using the enduring soul remnant.
Move the boulder to another of the circles of the timeworn lodestone.
Capture the revealed abyssal soul remnant.
Use the abyssal soul remnant to enter the rift in the east.
Capture the mote of shadow anima for 4% attunement. 60% total attunement
Capture the telekinetic soul remnant.
Return to the previous area.
Levitate the remaining boulder using the enduring soul remnant.
Move the boulder to the last circle on the timeworn lodestone.

Go on top of the timeworn lodestone. You will be teleported to an island and find the relic of the titans. Carrying this causes the western rift in the initial area to be active when entering Erebus, and automatically moves the three boulders on timeworn lodestone when entering any rifts.
Mine the shadow animica rock and crush the resulting shadow animica for 4% attunement. 64% total attunement
Capture the mote of shadow anima for 4% attunement. 68% total attunement
Leave via the extra action button or wait for the time to expire

questSteps.stepDescription: The Fourth time Entering Erubus do the following in Additional Information.
additionalStepInformation: Navigate back to the island through the timeworn lodestone, ensuring you still have the soul remnants.
Use the dark shadow anima bridge to traverse to the next island.
Capture the two motes of shadow anima for 8% attunement. 76% total attunement
Levitate the boulder next to the Boiling Rift using the enduring soul remnant.
Move the boulder to open the way to the inactive rift.
Enter the rift using the abyssal soul remnant.
Mine the shadow animica rock and crush the resulting shadow animica for 4% attunement. 80% total attunement; you may now stay for a minute and 30 seconds at a time without the handicap.
Capture the two motes of shadow anima for 8% attunement. 88% total attunement
Use the dark shadow anima bridge to traverse to the next island.
Capture the three motes of shadow anima for 12% attunement. 100% total attunement
Harvest the font of unimaginable memories to receive an unimaginable memory.
Re-enter Erebus and re-obtain an abyssal soul remnant.
Navigate back to the Boiling Rift.
Give the unimaginable memory to the Boiling Rift to transform it into a soul geyser.
Activate the soul geyser to travel to the next island.
Use the abyssal soul remnant to activate the inactive rift and travel through it.
Activate the Idol of the Leviathan.
A cutscene will play.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Moia or one of the other NPC's
Take the 5 Needle shards on the floor
Talk to Hannibus
Descend ledge to the north (Chat 1)
Talk to Hannibus or one of the other NPC's (Chat ~•~)
Teleport through the portal
Talk to Moia or one of the other NPC's
Talk to Elder Chahoua to the south
Talk to the Pastkeeper north of Elder Chahoua, next to Hannibus.
Talk to the Plantkeeper north of Seren.
Take 4 different seeds from around Iaia
additionalStepInformation: 1.) Just north-east of the Plantkeeper - flowering marsh plant.
2.) West of the Plantkeeper - roundleaf marsh plant (slightly south and before the path continues west).
3.) South-west of the Plantkeeper - marsh-fire plant.
4.) Just east of Elder Chahoua - longleaf marsh plant.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the Plantkeeper
Talk to the Pondkeeper north-east of the Plantkeeper
additionalStepInformation: Catch 4 fish in the fishing spot just north.
Talk to the Pondkeeper.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the Craftmaster (south-east of the Pondkeeper)
additionalStepInformation: Collect the 3 Ilujankan tools nearby to the east.
Talk to the Craftmaster.

questSteps.stepDescription: This is the final boss fight. Deaths are unsafe, so focus on surviving
additionalStepInformation: Each phase serves as a checkpoint, so if you teleport or die during the fight, you will resume from the start of the phase you left off at.
Re-gear if necessary and teleport back to the World Gate to resume, (Chat 1). Enter the World Gate twice.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Moia
Talk to Seren
Talk to Vicendithas
Place 2 Needle shards on any of the marked spots
additionalStepInformation: Kill the small shadows that spawn to gain a light core.
Attack the Dark Lord while having a light core in your inventory and repeat.
After the Dark Lord is dead, move the unstable energy to the Light Lord until it also dies.

questSteps.stepDescription: Place another Needle shard on any marked spot
additionalStepInformation: Kill the Small, Large, and Enraged muspahs; after each wave, damage Mah's Core (Mah wisp).
Avoid the fire walls (magic damage), lightning and fire balls (typeless damage).
Low level players may try to trap the melee muspah behind the core or Seren for semi safe-spotting.

questSteps.stepDescription: Place another Needle shard on any marked spot
additionalStepInformation: Avoid the fire, and then avoid the eggs (Surge and Bladed Dive can help).
Focus on surviving for around 2 minutes; you do not need to kill everything.
Defensive abilities such as Barricade and Reflect can help.
A powerburst of vitality may be very helpful.
Try staying in the south-west corner as the eggs won't go there.
If you survive long enough, you can continue.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head south towards the World Gate.
additionalStepInformation: Don't Surge or Bladed Dive as you may encounter a bug and have to talk to Seren again

questSteps.stepDescription: Activate the World Gate for a cutscene
Talk to Seren (Chat ~)
Return to Senntisten via the ancient door (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: You are able to use the Pontifex shadow ring teleport option to teleport to the surface entrance

questSteps.stepDescription: Head south, enter the Cathedral door, and talk to Azzanadra
Talk to Azzanadra again after Saradomin and Armadyl leave
Exit Senntisten and talk to Azzanadra (Chat 4)
additionalStepInformation: can leave quickly by lobbying or teleporting with your pontifex shadow ring

questSteps.stepDescription: Quest Complete!

questDetails.StartPoint: Talk to Moia at the surface entrance of Senntisten.
ItemsRequired: The Measure (If you completed Fate of the Gods)
Recommended: Equipment for Hunter, Mining, Fishing, and Woodcutting
Runes for Crystal Mask spell for battle with Croesus
EnemiesToDefeat: 4 generating glacors (level 112) and their glacyte minions (level 115)
Many Nodon siege engines (level 150; only some are fought conventionally and the majority are destroyed by commanding an abandoned siege engine)
Light Lord and Dark Lord (level 175, fought together) alongside multiple shadows (level 120)
Multiple aspects of Seren (level 175; you only need to survive them and not Defeat them all)
The shard of Erebus will not protect you in combat during this quest
